textEditor

Class History

  • java.lang.Object
    • textEditor.Subject
      • textEditor.History
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHistory

    public class History
extends Subject
implements IHistory
    Class added in version 2 and refactored especially to meet V3's needs. History contains the list of "undoable" commands along with the undoOperation and redoOperation methods[V3].

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface textEditor.IHistory

        ADDED_COMMAND, NO_ACTION, REMOVED_COMMAND
